name: analyze_fda_safety_signals
description: Analyzes FDA safety signals for drugs using pharmacovigilance data

inputs.name: drug_list
inputs.description: List of drugs to analyze for safety signals

inputs.name: comparison_period
inputs.description: Time period for comparison as [start_date, end_date]

inputs.name: signal_threshold
inputs.description: Threshold value for safety signal detection

result.description: Research log with FDA safety signal analysis
